translations: v.刺（poke 的 ing 形式）；拨火

sentences.sentence: The end of the cable was left poking out of the wall.
sentences.translation: 电缆头从墙里露出来了。

sentences.sentence: We've had journalists poking around and asking a lot of questions.
sentences.translation: 我们让记者追着问了许多问题。

sentences.sentence: The police spent the day poking around in his office but found nothing.
sentences.translation: 警察花了一天时间搜查他的办公室，但是没有发现什么情况。
